languages.text: {n}По когитатору пробегает вспышка машинной искры, в воздухе тянет паленым. Искаженным и надтреснутым голосом страж произносит:{/n} "Имя — Дарий фон Валанциус. Статус: преобразован по приказу своей младшей сестры Теодоры".

{n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."
languages.original_text: {n}По когитатору пробегает вспышка машинной искры, в воздухе тянет паленым. Искаженным и надтреснутым голосом страж произносит:{/n} "Имя — Дарий фон Валанциус. Статус: преобразован по приказу своей младшей сестры Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is a flash of the machine spark along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher says, his voice cracked and distorted,{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

{n}There is a flash of the machine spark along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher says, his voice cracked and distorted,{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

{n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's is voice cracked and distorted,{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

{n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's is voice cracked and distorted,{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

{n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

{n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

languages.text: {n}El destello de las chispas recorre el exterior del cogitador y el olor a carne quemada se extiende en el aire. La voz del vigilante suena crepitante y distorsionada:{/n} «Nombre: Darius von Valancius. Estado: transformado por orden de su hermana menor, Theodora».
languages.original_text: {n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}El destello de las chispas recorre el exterior del cogitador y el olor a carne quemada se extiende en el aire. La voz del vigilante suena crepitante y distorsionada:{/n} «Nombre: Darius von Valancius. Estado: transformado por orden de su hermana menor, Theodora».

languages.text: {n}沉思者的外部机壳闪过了一连串火花。空气中充满了肉体烧焦的味道，守望者的声音变得破碎、扭曲。{/n}“姓名：达利乌斯·冯·瓦兰修斯。身份：在妹妹西奥多拉的命令之下遭到了改造。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}沉思者的外部机壳闪过了一连串火花。空气中充满了肉体烧焦的味道，守望者的声音变得破碎、扭曲。{/n}“姓名：达利乌斯·冯·瓦兰修斯。身份：在妹妹西奥多拉的命令之下遭到了改造。”

languages.text: {n}考算機の外側に沿って火花が散り、焦げた肉の匂いが充満する。監視者の声は割れ、歪む。{/n}「名前：ダリウス・フォン・ヴァランシウス。ステータス：妹のシオドーラの命令で改造された状態」
languages.original_text: {n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機の外側に沿って火花が散り、焦げた肉の匂いが充満する。監視者の声は割れ、歪む。{/n}「名前：ダリウス・フォン・ヴァランシウス。ステータス：妹のシオドーラの命令で改造された状態」

languages.text: {n}Der Cogitator wird in eine Fontäne aus Funken gehüllt und der Geruch von verbranntem Fleisch erfüllt die Luft. Die Stimme des Wächters ist verzerrt:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: Auf Befehl seiner jüngeren Schwester Theodora transformiert:"
languages.original_text: {n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cogitator wird in eine Fontäne aus Funken gehüllt und der Geruch von verbranntem Fleisch erfüllt die Luft. Die Stimme des Wächters ist verzerrt:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: Auf Befehl seiner jüngeren Schwester Theodora transformiert:"

languages.text: {n}Une gerbe d'étincelles illumine le châssis du cogitateur, et une odeur de brûlé emplit la pièce. Le gardien reprend la parole d'une voix cassée et déformée :{/n} « Nom : Darius von Valancius. État : transformé sur ordre de sa sœur cadette Théodora. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une gerbe d'étincelles illumine le châssis du cogitateur, et une odeur de brûlé emplit la pièce. Le gardien reprend la parole d'une voix cassée et déformée :{/n} « Nom : Darius von Valancius. État : transformé sur ordre de sa sœur cadette Théodora. »

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın dış yüzeyinde bir kıvılcım parlıyor, havayı yanık et kokusu dolduruyor. Gözcü'nün sesi, çatlak ve bozuk çıkıyor.{/n} "İsim: Darius von Valancius. Durum: Kardeşi Theodora'nın emriyle dönüştürülmüş."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a flash of sparks along the exterior of the cogitator, and the smell of burnt meat fills the air. The watcher's voice is cracked and distorted:{/n} "Name: Darius von Valancius. Status: transformed on the order of his younger sister Theodora."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayarın dış yüzeyinde bir kıvılcım parlıyor, havayı yanık et kokusu dolduruyor. Gözcü'nün sesi, çatlak ve bozuk çıkıyor.{/n} "İsim: Darius von Valancius. Durum: Kardeşi Theodora'nın emriyle dönüştürülmüş."
